# Country Road (Double Back)

This is a [Country Road](https://puzz.link/rules.html?country) puzzle variant where each region must be visited exactly twice.  
NOTE: There is a uniqueness issue with one part of this puzzle that was discovered later - to get the answer checker to trigger, the 1x4 region under the 2x4 region with a `6` must be split into lengths of 1 and 3 (not 2 and 2).

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2024/countryRoadDoubleBack1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
